pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![](https://codecov.io/gh/nickderobertis/py-ex-latex/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/nickderobertis/py-ex-latex)# py-ex-latex## OverviewThis project is aimed at creating LaTeX documents using only Python,without directly writing LaTeX code. Ratherthan building a direct Python API to LaTeX, this package has its own,simpler API to creating documents.## LinksSee the[documentation here.](https://nickderobertis.github.io/py-ex-latex/)## AuthorCreated by Nick DeRobertis. MIT License.
